items.question: How do I update my profile information?
items.answer: Click the 'Edit' button in the Profile Information section, make your changes, then click 'Save' to update your profile.

items.question: How to change my password?
items.answer: Go to Settings section and click 'Change Password' button. You'll need to enter your current password and new password twice for confirmation.

items.question: How do I log out from other devices?
items.answer: In the Active Sessions section, you can see all your logged-in devices. Click 'Terminate' next to any session you want to end.

items.question: How to enable two-factor authentication?
items.answer: Go to Settings ‚Üí Security ‚Üí Two-Factor Authentication. Follow the setup process to link your mobile device.

items.question: How to manage notification preferences?
items.answer: In the Notifications section, you can toggle Email notifications, Push notifications, and Security alerts on/off.

items.question: How to export my personal data?
items.answer: Click 'Export My Data' in the Data & Privacy section. Your data will be prepared and sent to your email address.

items.question: How to upload company data?
items.answer: Navigate to the Collect section ‚Üí Companies. Click 'Add New' and fill in the required company information.

items.question: What file formats are supported?
items.answer: We support Excel (.xlsx, .xls), CSV, and JSON files for data import. Maximum file size is 10MB.

items.question: How to validate my data?
items.answer: After uploading, the system automatically validates your data. Check the validation report for any errors or warnings.

items.question: I can't log in to my account
items.answer: Check your email and password. If you forgot your password, use the 'Forgot Password' link. Contact support if issues persist.

items.question: The page is loading slowly
items.answer: Try refreshing the page. Check your internet connection. Clear browser cache if the problem continues.

items.question: My data didn't save properly
items.answer: Make sure you clicked 'Save' after making changes. Check for any error messages. Try refreshing and re-entering the data.
